casebody.data:
Vita S. SHANNON, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Aron L. RALSTON, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 159884-9
COA: 339944, 343213, 343886, 344356, 344418 & 346344 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 8, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee to extend the time for filing his answer is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 23, 2019.
